alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 7:58AM MST until December 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 11 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches below 6000 feet with up to 24 inches across the mountains and passes above 6000 feet. Periods of gusty winds Thursday as high as 40 mph creating blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Idaho portion of the northern Wasatch Range including Emigration Summit. * WHEN...From noon Thursday to 11 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
